metadata.title: CVE-2020-15647 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A Content Provider in Firefox for Android allowed local files accessible bythe browser to be read by a remote webpage, leading to sensitive datadisclosure, including cookies for other origins. This vulnerability affectsFirefox for < Android.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
